name: Protect the Circle
description:
How long can you Protect the Circle? Rotate your shield to ward off attackers and collect points. Get enough points and level up! Don't let those attackers get too close or it'll be game over!

HOW TO PLAY:
- Tap and hold the left side of the screen to rotate counter-clockwise
- Tap and hold the right side of the screen to rotate clockwise
- Block as many invading debris as you can with your shield
- If your circle is hit too many times, it's GAME OVER

Download and play Protect The Circle today!
